name.$comment: The official name of the player or service

url.$comment: URL to the website or origin of this media player

represents.$comment: IDs of other media players this player may represent

id.$comment: A unique identifier for a media player

sources.$comment: All known source identifiers for a media player

win_smtc.$comment: A list of app user model IDs via SMTC on Windows

mac_bundle.$comment: A list of app bundle identifiers on Mac

lin_mpris.$comment: A list of source identifiers or source matchers for MPRIS via D-Bus on Linux

web_domain.$comment: A list of fully-qualified domain names on the web

win_winrt.$comment: DEPRECATED: Will be removed in v4

mac_mediaremote.$comment: DEPRECATED: Will be removed in v4

sourceMatcherMpris.$comment: Matchers for a media source that reports metadata via MPRIS

service.$comment: The value to match against the D-Bus service name without the "org.mpris.MediaPlayer2." prefix and without any instance suffix

identity.$comment: The value to match against the "org.mpris.MediaPlayer2.Identity" D-Bus property of the service

desktop_entry.$comment: The value to match against the "org.mpris.MediaPlayer2.DesktopEntry" D-Bus property of the service

sourceIdentifier.$comment: An identifier for a media source, e.g. an application package identifier

pure.$comment: Media from this player can be expected to be free of personal data from the user. This excludes multimedia players that might e.g. play personal home videos

service.$comment: This media player is a streaming service and provides licensed content that must be branded with the service's logo

browser.$comment: This media player is a web browser

content.$comment: The type of content this media player is designed to play. Items should be ordered starting with the type of content that is played most with this player to the type of content that is played least. Uncommon content types for this player should be omitted

allOf.$comment: The root audio type must be present too
The root audio type is not sufficient by itself
The root video type must be present too
The root video type is not sufficient by itself

extra.$comment: Extra properties that might be useful

discord_application_id.$comment: The ID of a Discord application registered at https://discord.com/developers/applications which has the name of this media player

experimental.$comment: Experimental properties that might vanish or change their meaning without major version bumps
